meaningMnemonic: Through various <kanji>test</kanji>s over the <kanji>passage of time</kanji>, you have gained much <vocabulary>experience</vocabulary>. Time and testing is all it takes.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
